text: @RandPaul You dropped the ball on Trump's quid pro quo. He has sent the country into a downward spiral. He's gone tweet-crazy with every conspiracy theory. Nearly 85K have died from COVID19, and you want to investigate President Obama?! #RandPaulIsAnIdiot
